1.title: Silverado Fenders & Bedsides
1.plot: Fiberglass fenders and bedsides get installed on our Project Chevy Silverado. Plus, how to select off-road wheels and tires.

2.title: Silverado Long Travel Suspension
2.plot: A long travel suspension kit and coil over shocks get installed on Project Chevy Silverado. Making room for larger wheels and tires.

3.title: Silverado Bedcage
3.plot: Fabricating a bedcage for Project Silverado, installing new leaf springs and long travel bypass shocks.

4.title: Silverado Rear Bumper & Tire Carrier
4.plot: Fabricating a rear bumper and spare tire carrier for Project Silverado with race truck style aluminum panels. Installing aftermarket rear facing LEDs.

5.title: Silverado Front Bumper & Lights
5.plot: Fabricating a front prerunner bumper for Project Silverado. Installing aftermarket LED off-road lights.

6.title: More Power for Your Prerunner
6.plot: We get more power out of Project Silverado with a new air intake and exhaust. Project Desert Ranger gets a new tire carrier.

7.title: Project F-150 Fenders & Front Suspension
7.plot: Fiberglass fenders and a long travel kit get installed on the front of Project F-150.

8.title: Project F-150 Fiberglass Bedsides & Leaf Springs
8.plot: Fiberglass bedsides and a long travel leaf springs get installed on the rear of Project F-150.

9.title: Project F-150 Front Bumper & Lights
9.plot: Fabrication of the prerunner bumper for the front of Project F-150 and adding LED off-road lights.

10.title: Project F-150 Rear Bumper
10.plot: Fabrication of the rear prerunner bumper for Project F-150. Bed liner gets sprayed in.

11.title: Project F-150 Bedcage & Bypass Shocks
11.plot: Fabrication of bedcage with triple bypass shocks for Project F-150. Fenders for Project Silverado go into paint.

12.title: Ranger Bumper & F-150 Testing
12.plot: Fabrication of a prerunner bumper for a Ford Ranger. Project F-150 hits the desert for testing.

13.title: Ford vs. Chevy Prerunners
13.plot: Installation of a cold air intake of Project F-150. Project F-150 and Project Silverado head out to the desert for testing.

imdb.plot outline: Hosts Adem Martin del Campo and Austin Wesolowski show you all the steps to turn a stock truck into a capable off-road vehicle. Prerunners are a style of truck that is bred from off-road racing where long travel suspension is added to stock trucks to pre-run the race course. Prerunners have crossed over from desert racing into a popular way of customizing any truck - they can be driven on the streets and off-road. Prerunners used to be seen only in the desert Southwest, but they're capability off-road has taken them everywhere - no matter the terrain. With step-by-step fabrication, bolt-on modifications and cool tools, FullDroopTV sets to educate and entertain fans of off-road sports.
imdb.title: FullDroopTV
plot: _FullDroopTV_ (qv) is a television show dedicated to fabricating prerunners and off-road vehicles.::_FullDroopTV_ (qv)
